post.author: 부기흡

comment.author: 김형태
comment.content: It's very nice, but how can I add some idea to the project homepage?

comment.author: 부기흡
comment.content: Post your idea here, then someone in charge will update the homepage accordingly. This someone is either myself or Nariy at the moment, but not limited.

post.content:
The design classes have been revised. I tried to capture the feedback as much as I understood it but let me know if I missed any points.

Review and feedback from:
http://www.coska.com/projects/filegate or alternatively
http://filegate.borasoft.com

Go to Documents -> Software Design Document (Draft)

Cheers.
post.title: [config] 2nd review - configuration/common design
